short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to make niftys show rarity, similar avatars, attribute specific scarcity ratios, and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On the niftys marketplace page it will show you the rarest attribute an avatar has, and show it in green if it is rarer than the maximum you set in the options.
